title: What is the most colour found on Earth? - Quora

response.answer_text: Back in pre-unit school and before joining senior year in my school, we use to get so fascinated by the appearance of the rainbow any time there could be light showers By then we could deduce that, on earth there are only 7 colours. Join school on a high level,we learned that there so many colours on earth. But, there is one or two colours common in all colors we have in the world that is BLACK AND WHITE. From that you can admit with me that, the most color found on earth is both BLACK AND WHITE

Blue is the most popular color in the world. The second favorite are red and green respectively, followed by orange, brown and purple. Yellow is the least favorite color. Another interesting survey finding: both men and women increasingly dislike orange as theyou grow old.
Black . because it absorbs most of the light
